comment._content: incredible resolution for a long shot, i bet it was a leitz leica lens!!!

comment.author: 45075317@N05
comment._content: ...I love the two guys sitting on a fence next to the stadium, also the hundreds of people who couldn't afford a ticket and are clearly visible perched on the nearby hill....this is indeed and incredible and fascinating shot....1938 my dad was in Brooklyn, Nazis had chased my family there two years prior to that at gunpoint calling them "drek-Juden" and Israel wasn't accepting Jews anymore....Thank God for Brooklyn
